CustomField.description: Leave unchecked if you don't want Capture to download Permission Sets. SCAN will still create Permission Set component records in the MCL. Leaving unchecked will greatly enhance performance.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Leave unchecked if you don't want Capture to download Permission Sets. SCAN will still create Permission Set component records in the MCL. Leaving unchecked will greatly enhance performance.
CustomField.label: Include Permission Sets
